mapper.select: select reservation.r_num, reservation.r_date, reservation.r_time, pet.p_name, medi.m_name, reservation.r_apply, reservation.r_content from reservation join medi ON reservation.m_id = medi.m_id join pet ON reservation.p_num = pet.p_num where reservation.c_id=#{cId} order by reservation.r_date asc, reservation.r_time asc

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT format(@rownum:= @rownum+1, 0) as RN, A.* FROM ( select reservation.r_num, reservation.r_date, reservation.r_time, pet.p_name, medi.m_name, reservation.r_apply, reservation.r_content, reservation.r_fix from reservation join medi ON reservation.m_id = medi.m_id join pet ON reservation.p_num = pet.p_num where reservation.c_id=#{id} order by reservation.r_date desc, reservation.r_time asc ) A, (select @rownum :=0,0) R ) B WHERE RN BETWEEN ${start} AND ${end}
select * from medi
select count(*) from medi where m_name like CONCAT('%', #{mName}, '%')

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT format(@rownum:= @rownum+1, 0) as RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM medi WHERE m_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{mName}, '%') ORDER BY m_name ASC ) A, (select @rownum :=0,0) R ) B WHERE RN BETWEEN ${start} AND ${end}
select * from medi where m_id = #{mediId}
select * from pet where c_id = #{c_id}
mapper.insert: insert into reservation (r_num, m_id, p_num, c_id, r_content, r_date, r_time, r_name, r_tel) values (r_num, #{mId}, (select p_num from pet where p_name=#{pName} and c_id=#{cId} ),#{cId}, #{rContent}, #{rDate}, #{rTime}, #{rName}, #{rTel})
mapper.select: select count(r_time) from reservation where r_date=#{date} order by r_time asc
select r_time, count(*) from reservation where m_id=#{mId} and r_date =#{rDate} group by r_time
mapper.update: update reservation set r_apply="취소" where r_num=#{rNum}
update reservation set r_apply=#{apply} where r_num=#{num}
mapper.select: select customer.c_email, reservation.r_date, reservation.r_time, reservation.r_name, customer.c_tel, pet.p_section, pet.p_type, pet.p_name, pet.p_sex, pet.p_age, reservation.r_content, pet.p_photo from reservation join customer on reservation.c_id = customer.c_id join pet on reservation.p_num = pet.p_num where reservation.r_num = #{rNum}
select r.r_time, r.r_content, r.r_apply, r.r_date, p.p_type, r.r_num from reservation r, pet p where r.m_id = #{mId} and r_apply="대기" and r.p_num = p.p_num order by r.r_date limit #{start}, #{limit}
select count(*) from reservation r, pet p where r.m_id = #{mId} and r_apply="대기" and r.p_num = p.p_num order by r.r_date;

select r.r_time, r.r_content, r.r_apply, r.r_date, p.p_type,r_num,r_fix from reservation r, pet p where r.m_id = #{mId} and r_apply="확정" and r.p_num = p.p_num order by r.r_date limit #{start}, #{limit}
select count(*) from reservation r, pet p where r.m_id = #{mId} and r_apply="확정" and r.p_num = p.p_num order by r.r_date;
select r.r_time, r.r_content, r.r_apply, r.r_date, p.p_type from reservation r, pet p where r.m_id = #{mId} and r_apply="취소" and r.p_num = p.p_num order by r.r_date limit #{start}, #{limit}
select count(*) from reservation r, pet p where r.m_id = #{mId} and r_apply="취소" and r.p_num = p.p_num order by r.r_date;
